name: Next.js Revalidate Tag Route
description: Use revalidateTag in a Route Handler to refresh tagged data.

files.template:
import { revalidateTag } from 'next/cache';
export async function POST(req: Request){ const { searchParams } = new URL(req.url); const tag = searchParams.get('tag') || '{{tag}}'; revalidateTag(tag); return Response.json({ revalidated: tag }); }
